author: siddharthkonma
title: Konma Xperience Centre
description: Learning centers are boring! Imagine an Xperience center instead that shows real-world examples of using Blockchain technology!
solution: An Xperience center for members to learn from real-time examples and how Konma is using blockchain and building solutions on Cardano.
experience: We have experts in retail, e-commerce, community management, marketing & Technology faculty to provide relevant experience to the community.
